messages.messageBody:
Pledge of Allegiance

Here is something we made up after watching nick news this morning and
talking about this whole God/country thing.

this is what we came up with. Salute it, mock it, ignore it, embrace it...
whatever you may. But nonetheless, here it is:

I pledge allegiance to my country,
The United States of America,
And to the people,
For which all stands proud,
One nation founded upon religious freedom,
Undividable, with individuality and equality for all.

We're not debating anything, just venting some brain steam.

Proud to be an American!!!!!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
